text: Riley sells chocolate cupcakes and vanilla cupcakes.  Baking a batch of chocolate cupcakes takes 1.50 pounds of flour and 3 eggs.  Baking a batch of vanilla cupcakes takes 1.75 cups of flour and 2 eggs.  Riley has 12 cups of flour and 14 eggs.  He makes $3 profit per batch of chocloate cupcakes.  He makes $1 profit per batch of vanilla cupcakes.  How many batches of chocolate cupcakes should Riley make to maximize his profit?
